alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Southeast Carter; Southeast Greene; Unicoi (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 02 at 2:34PM CST until March 04 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM FRIDAY TO 4 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Johnson, Southeast Greene, Unicoi and Southeast Carter Counties. * WHEN...From 10 AM Friday to 4 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The saturated ground will make conditions more susceptible to down trees.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Johnson; Southeast Carter; Southeast Greene; Unicoi
